member.name: T:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages
member.summary: Manages error messages returned by built-in keywords.
member.remarks:
Default messages are provided by culture-specific resource files.
Many messages support tokens in the format `[[foo]]`. Each message will specify the tokens it supports.

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Const
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[value]] - the value in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.ContainsTooFew
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for when there are too few matching items.
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the number of matching items provided in the JSON instance - [[minimum]] - the lower limit specified in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.ContainsTooMany
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for when there are too many matching items.
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the number of matching items provided in the JSON instance - [[maximum]] - the upper limit specified in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Dependencies
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[properties]] - the properties which failed to match the requirements

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.DependentRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[missing]] - the value in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.DependentSchemas
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[value]] - the value in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Enum
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks:
Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the value provided in the JSON instance - [[values]] - the available values in the schema
The default messages are static and do not use these tokens as enum values may be any JSON type and could be quite large. They are provided to support custom messages.

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets a culture to use for error messages. Default is .

member.name: M:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.ReplaceTokens(System.String,System.ValueTuple{System.String,System.Object}[])
member.summary: Replaces tokens in the form of `[[token]]` with a specified value, serialized as JSON.
member.param: Tuple of the token name (without brackets) and the value which will replace it.
member.returns: The detokenized string.

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.ExclusiveMaximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the value provided in the JSON instance - [[limit]] - the upper limit in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.ExclusiveMinimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the value provided in the JSON instance - [[limit]] - the lower limit in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.UnknownFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for an unknown format.
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[format]] - the format key

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for the .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[format]] - the format key

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.FormatWithDetail
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for the with additional information from the format validation.
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[format]] - the format key - [[detail]] - the format key

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.InvalidItemsForm
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for when is specified with an array of schemas in a draft 2020-12 or later schema.
member.remarks: No tokens are supported.

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.FalseSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for the "false" schema.
member.remarks: No tokens are supported.

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the value provided in the JSON instance - [[limit]] - the upper limit in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.MaxItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the number of items provided in the JSON instance - [[limit]] - the upper limit specified in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.MaxLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the length of the JSON string - [[limit]] - the upper limit specified in the schema

member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the length of the JSON string - [[limit]] - the lower limit specified in the schema

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.MinProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .

member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[pattern]] - the regular expression

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks:
Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the value provided in the JSON instance - [[pattern]] - the number of subschemas that passed validation
The default messages are static and do not use these tokens as string values could be quite large. They are provided to support custom messages.

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.Required
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[missing]] - the properties missing from the JSON instance

member.name: P:Json.Schema.ErrorMessages.MetaSchemaValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for when the schema cannot be validated against the meta-schema.
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[uri]] - the URI of the meta-schema

member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[received]] - the type of value provided in the JSON instance - [[expected]] - the type(s) required by the schema

member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for .
member.remarks: Available tokens are: - [[duplicates]] - the indices of duplicate pairs as a comma-delimited list of "(x, y)" items

member.summary: Gets or sets the error message for when a vocabulary is unknown but required.
